description.english: Study the How to play section

displayName.english: Hit the wheel and double the stakes

description.english: Finish a level and get a 2x score multiplier
Make a tile red with the first turn (that was not already red)
Make two tiles red with the first turn (that were not already red)
Swap two blue (ice cold) tiles which become red (hot)
Move the same tile 5 times in a row without finding it“s intended place
Move every tile at least once during a level
Start a new game having an almost completed puzzle
Finish a level even when you get 0 points for it
Swap 100 tiles across any number of games
Swap 500 tiles across any number of games
Swap 1000 tiles across any number of games
Swap 2500 tiles across any number of games
Swap 5000 tiles across any number of games
Swap 10000 tiles across any number of games
Score 25000 or higher in one level (non-Hardcore mode)
Score 75000 or higher in one level (non-Hardcore mode)
Score 100000 or higher in one level (non-Hardcore mode)
Score 200000 or higher in one level (non-Hardcore mode)
Score 300000 or higher in one level (non-Hardcore mode)
Score 400000 or higher in one level (non-Hardcore mode)
Make all tiles on the field blue (ice cold)
Make all tiles on the field light blue (cold)
Make all tiles on the field cyan (chilly)
Make all tiles on the field yellow (warm)
Make all tiles on the field light red (hot)
Spend more than 10 minutes working on one puzzle
Solve a puzzle in under 10 seconds
Swap two tiles so that none of them changes color
Solve at least one puzzle in Hardcore mode using each of the three distance options
In a 6-row puzzle, make 6 rows where all tiles have the same color, while each row has a different color
